Importing various spatial data (drylands of the world, elevation/mountains, bird richness), to play around and look for interesting patterns.

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(here)

source(here("scripts/spatial_data_fns.R"))

sf_use_s2(FALSE)

```

```{r}
ggplot(get_drylands()) + geom_sf()
```

```{r}
# explore Higgins et al 2016 biomes

get_higgins() %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_tile(mapping = aes(x = x, y = y, fill = biome))

```
